scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -r views dist/views && cp -r .elasticbeanstalk dist/.elasticbeanstalk && cp deployed-package.json dist/package.json && cp -r static dist/static && ../node_modules/.bin/tsc --p ./tsconfig.json
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,Node" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run build -- -w" "npm run serve"
scripts.serve: source ../.env && STRIPE_SECRET=$STRIPE_SECRET STRIPE_CLIENT=$STRIPE_CLIENT STRIPE_ENDPOINT_SECRET=$STRIPE_ENDPOINT_SECRET SLACK_CLIENT_ID=$SLACK_CLIENT_ID SLACK_VERIFICATION_TOKEN=$SLACK_VERIFICATION_TOKEN SLACK_CLIENT_SECRET=$SLACK_CLIENT_SECRET  MONGO_URL=$MONGO_URL nodemon dist/index.js
